tree.name: Aaron Gordon
tree.tradeDescription: Traded from Orlando Magic with Gary Clark for Gary Harris, RJ Hampton, and 2025 1st round pick
tree.note: Forward originally drafted 4th overall by Orlando in 2014

assetsGivenUp.name: Gary Harris
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Acquired via draft-night trade from Chicago Bulls
assetsGivenUp.note: Originally drafted 19th by Chicago, traded to Denver with Jusuf Nurkic

assetsGivenUp.name: RJ Hampton
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Acquired from New Orleans in 4-team Jrue Holiday deal (MIL/NOP/OKC/DEN)
assetsGivenUp.note: Originally drafted 24th by Milwaukee, traded to Denver

assetsGivenUp.name: 2023 DEN 1st Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Denver's 2023 first-round pick sent to OKC in 4-team Jrue Holiday deal, became #27 overall

assetsGivenUp.name: 2025 DEN 1st Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Denver's 2025 1st round pick (became #25 overall, top-5 protected)
